languages.text: {n}Голос великана перекрывает вой смерча — и в его словах сквозит тяжкий гнев и проблески восхищения.{/n} "Ты!... Ты, ничтожество, обрел{mf||а} оба осколка! Неужто ты мнишь себя новым претендетом на милость Предела? Что ж... судьба распорядится так, как угодно Ткачу. Ступай же по узору, Вольный Торговец... ступай".

{n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос великана перекрывает вой смерча — и в его словах сквозит тяжкий гнев и проблески восхищения.{/n} "Ты!... Ты, ничтожество, обрел{mf||а} оба осколка! Неужто ты мнишь себя новым претендетом на милость Предела? Что ж... судьба распорядится так, как угодно Ткачу. Ступай же по узору, Вольный Торговец... ступай".

traits.locale_text: {n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both of the shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

{n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

{n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

languages.text: {n}巨人的声音盖过了呼啸的狂风，充满了愤怒，还带着一丝怀疑的意味。{/n}“你……你这只卑微的虫子，居然得到了两块碎片！莫非你真的以为你是冉冉升起的勇士，打算得到破晓锋刃的青睐吗？那就这样吧……命运必将执行命运编织者的意志。跟着规律的脚步前进，行商浪人……继续前进吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

traits.locale_text: {n}巨人的声音盖过了呼啸的狂风，充满了愤怒，还带着一丝怀疑的意味。{/n}“你……你这只卑微的虫子，居然得到了两块碎片！莫非你真的以为你是冉冉升起的勇士，打算得到破晓锋刃的青睐吗？那就这样吧……命运必将执行命运编织者的意志。跟着规律的脚步前进，行商浪人……继续前进吧。”

languages.text: {n}La voix du géant, chargée de fureur et d'une pointe d'incrédulité, couvre le hurlement du vent.{/n} « Vous... Comment un insecte comme vous a-t-il pu mettre la main sur les deux fragments ? Pensez-vous vraiment être digne de prétendre aux faveurs de la Lame ? Qu'il en soit ainsi... Le destin accomplira la volonté du Tisseur. Suivez le motif, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... Oui, poursuivez votre route. »
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du géant, chargée de fureur et d'une pointe d'incrédulité, couvre le hurlement du vent.{/n} « Vous... Comment un insecte comme vous a-t-il pu mettre la main sur les deux fragments ? Pensez-vous vraiment être digne de prétendre aux faveurs de la Lame ? Qu'il en soit ainsi... Le destin accomplira la volonté du Tisseur. Suivez le motif, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... Oui, poursuivez votre route. »

languages.text: {n}La voz del coloso se eleva sobre el vendaval, repleta de furia y marcada por la incredulidad:{/n} «Tú... ¡Un mero insecto como tú ha obtenido ambos fragmentos! ¿Acaso te consideras un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} aspirante al favor del Filo? Que así sea... el destino obrará la voluntad del Tejedor. Sigue la pauta, Comerciante Independiente... Adelante».
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del coloso se eleva sobre el vendaval, repleta de furia y marcada por la incredulidad:{/n} «Tú... ¡Un mero insecto como tú ha obtenido ambos fragmentos! ¿Acaso te consideras un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} aspirante al favor del Filo? Que así sea... el destino obrará la voluntad del Tejedor. Sigue la pauta, Comerciante Independiente... Adelante».

languages.text: {n}吹き荒れる風の中に響くその大男の声は、怒りと不信に満ちていた。{/n}「お前が…たかが虫けらに過ぎぬお前が、両方の欠片を手にしたというのか！お前は本当に、己を教会の恩寵を手にする新たな徒弟だと思っているのか？ならば…運命は、織り手の意志を果たすだろう。そのパターンを辿るがいい、自由開拓者よ」
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

traits.locale_text: {n}吹き荒れる風の中に響くその大男の声は、怒りと不信に満ちていた。{/n}「お前が…たかが虫けらに過ぎぬお前が、両方の欠片を手にしたというのか！お前は本当に、己を教会の恩寵を手にする新たな徒弟だと思っているのか？ならば…運命は、織り手の意志を果たすだろう。そのパターンを辿るがいい、自由開拓者よ」

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Riesen erhebt sich über die heulenden Winde — und sie ist schwer vor Zorn und durchzogen von Ungläubigkeit:{/n} "Ihr ... Ihr, ein bloßes Insekt, habt beide Splitter in Euren Besitz gebracht! Haltet Ihr Euch wirklich für {mf|einen neuen Aspiranten, der|eine neue Aspirantin, die} um die Gunst des Rands buhlt? So sei es ... Das Schicksal wird den Willen des Webers umsetzen. Dann folgt also dem Muster, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... Marschiert weiter."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Riesen erhebt sich über die heulenden Winde — und sie ist schwer vor Zorn und durchzogen von Ungläubigkeit:{/n} "Ihr ... Ihr, ein bloßes Insekt, habt beide Splitter in Euren Besitz gebracht! Haltet Ihr Euch wirklich für {mf|einen neuen Aspiranten, der|eine neue Aspirantin, die} um die Gunst des Rands buhlt? So sei es ... Das Schicksal wird den Willen des Webers umsetzen. Dann folgt also dem Muster, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} ... Marschiert weiter."

languages.text: {n}Devin şiddetli rüzgârı dindiren sesi, öfke ve şaşkınlıkla yankılanıyor.{/n} "Sen... Böcekten farkı olmayan sen, iki parçayı da ele geçirmişsin! Sahiden Tan Vakti'nin gözüne girebilecek bir talip olduğunu mu sanıyorsun? Öyle olsun... Kader Dokuyan ne derse o olur. Çizilmiş yoldan git bakalım Hür Tacir. Yürü."
languages.original_text: {n}The giant's voice rises over the howling winds — and it is heavy with fury and tinged with disbelief:{/n} "You... You, a mere insect, have obtained both shards! Do you truly think yourself a new aspirant vying for the favour of the Edge? So be it... Fate shall execute the will of the Weaver. Follow the pattern, then, Rogue Trader... March on."

traits.locale_text: {n}Devin şiddetli rüzgârı dindiren sesi, öfke ve şaşkınlıkla yankılanıyor:{/n} "Sen... Böcekten farkı olmayan sen, iki parçayı da ele geçirmişsin! Sahiden Tan Vakti’nin gözüne girebilecek bir talip olduğunu mu sanıyorsun? Öyle olsun... Kader Dokuyan ne derse, o olur. Çizilmiş yoldan git bakalım, Hür Tacir. Yürü.”
